Articles.Content:
As if!

TUBM is facing an important life-changing decision right now.

Nope. Just waiting for aero advice.

TUBM will say something correct about the user below them.

Probably not

TUBM is a user.

Yes i am.

TUBM is not a human.

I'm a kerbal.

TUBM is not a user (WHAAAT)

I would consider myself one. That's not something many people get to actually say and have it be true.

Do you consider yourself a human?

Sometimes, i wonder...

TUBM likes dogs.

Ye-Ahh-chooooo!-ah... I might be a tiny bit allergic...

TUBM is not allergic to any animal.

EDIT: The user below me just got Ninja'd

Yeah. No animal alergy, just nickel...

[ninja]I'm not a "dog person", but I'm comfortable with them....[/ninja]

The user below me likes cats.

Wow, it's like you know me!

And I know the user below me, who regularly eats ham sandwiches

Had three yesterday. Out of ham today, will do bacon.

TUBM is an ovo-lacto vegetarian.

Nah - will basically eat everything. Just no brussels sprouts.

The user below me is a simple vegetarian.

No, I am omnivorous.

The user below me doesn't care what people say.

I find certain things my brother says to be very annoying

TUBM is a program

I'm german, does that count?

The user below me is not german.

American, but some of my ancestors were German.

The user below me has been suffering from spiders in their house.

Not my house, but I have a bit of the yard as a home for them. They enjoy it there.

You think that's weird...

Yes.

TUBM is too old for KSP

(Ninja'd, but I still had the better answer) No, no, not at all... *Quickly contacts hacker friend to pinpoint the location of that bit of your yard, then rushes off to buy a plane ticket and a flamethrower*

Nobody is too old for KSP. Unless you are dead, but then I still don't know why you weren't buried with a copy. Unless you died before it was released, but then it would still be worthwhile to dig up your casket to place the copy in it alongside your remains. However, you could've died somewhere unreachable or not had remains found... at that point, you're just missing out... man, this answer got morbid quickly.

Is my burning hatred of spiders too much?

Edited August 14, 2015 by Noname117

No, no, not at all... *Quickly contacts hacker friend to pinpoint the location of that bit of your yard, then rushes off to buy a plane ticket and a flamethrower*

Is my burning hatred of spiders too much?

You've been ninja'd

You've been ninja'd

No worries, I answered yours too.

My question (from the previous page) is: Does the user below me thing my burning hatred of spiders is too much?

Probably not. Once when an ant wanted to eat the chicken I was cooking, I put it next to the burner. Quite literally.

TUBM is evil

Maybe

TUBM enjoys career in its current form

Nope - I try it from time to time, but im at home in sandbox mode.

The user below me prefers sandbox aswell.

Sandbox4life.

The user below me owns a physical sandbox.
